# nw_framer_start_result_ready

**Global Variable**

The protocol is immediately ready to send and receive data.

## Declaration

```swift
var nw_framer_start_result_ready: nw_framer_start_result_t { get }
```

## Start Results

- **nw_framer_start_result_will_mark_ready**: The protocol will perform a handshake, preventing the overall connection from becoming ready until [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/nw_framer_mark_ready(_:)] is called.
